attributes.action: If You Are Old Enough To Have Sex You Are Old Enough For A Smear Test
attributes.additional_details:
A doctor is aloud to give a thirteen year old girl birth control pills but she is not aloud to have a smear test until she is 25!
Birth control pills can cause all kinds of side effects and the poor young generation will not know of the damage until they are 25!
If you are mature enough to have sex you are mature enough to have a smear test and I think its about time the government took this seriously. They say cancer is being caught later these days so why is no action being taken? Cervical cancer is deadly and I believe this would help increase the survival rates if Women were getting the correct checks at a younger age to avoid more and more families losing loved ones to this Disease.
